line: [Intro]
Love was the egg, see
[Verse 1]
And it was born in a cloud with silver lining
Uh-huh
But it broke
I mean it hatched on the ground so time flew right by me
And voila
[Hook]
I know you thought that life was gon be easy when you didn't call
You found out you were wrong
See, I know you thought your life was gon be easy
You thought you had it all
But you found that you were wrong
See, maybe, there was something wrong, and you weren't telling me, no (Nooo)
See, see, maybe, the laugh's on me, and life was telling me a joke
[Verse 2]
Well, they say that if it's yours
And you let it go
If it comes back to you
It was yours all along
Well, I let you go, along with those lies from you
I wonder what else lies in you
Or did the lies just eat it gone
[Hook]
I know you thought that life was gon be easy when you didn't call
You found out you were wrong
See, I know you thought your life was gon be easy
You thought you had it all
But you found that you were wrong
See, maybe, there was something wrong, and you weren't telling me, no (Nooo)
See, see, maybe, the laugh's on me, and life was telling me a joke
Babe
[Outro: Pharrell, speaking]
Hold it now
How do you feel right now
Yeah me too
Hey Yeah
Oh, babe!
Hold it now
You all right
See, do you remember what it's like to wake up in her love nest
(get it, love nest)
And now she's gone - gone, gone, gone
At which point you realize life is but a joke, and the laugh's on you
It's funny, Right?
Babe!
